price: ‹ ߊߟߊ߫ › ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊ߬ ߡߌ߬ߘߊ߫ ߞߍ߬ ߸ ߌ ߞߊ߫ ߛߌߟߊ߲߫ ߘߋ߬ ߒ ߘߴߊ߬ ߟߊߛߊ߬ߦߌ߲߬ ߊ߬ ߢߊ߫ ߞߘߐ ߡߊ߬
arabic: قَالَ خُذۡهَا وَلَا تَخَفۡۖ سَنُعِيدُهَا سِيرَتَهَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla khudh'hā walā takhaf sanuʿīduhā sīratahā al-ūlā
